title: Four fruiting trees for drought-prone gardens

subtasks: Driving tractor with hay loader attachment.
Aligning hay bales with the truck bed.
Lowering hay bales into the truck bed carefully.
Operate steering wheel to navigate the field.
Use foot pedals to control speed and hydraulics.
Open tailgate of the truck.
Lift hay bales out of the truck bed.
Stack hay bales in a designated area.
Carry hay bales from the truck to the stacking area.
Arrange bales neatly in a stack.
Ensure stability of the stack.
